argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | srhmsubc.s | |- A. r e. S r e. Ring |
| 2 |  | srhmsubc.c | |- C = ( U i^i S ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( r = X -> ( r e. Ring <-> X e. Ring ) ) |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_vtoclri | |- ( X e. S -> X e. Ring ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_anim2i | |- ( ( X e. U /\ X e. S ) -> ( X e. U /\ X e. Ring ) ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_elin2 | |- ( X e. C <-> ( X e. U /\ X e. S ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_elin | |- ( X e. ( U i^i Ring ) <-> ( X e. U /\ X e. Ring ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_3imtr4i | |- ( X e. C -> X e. ( U i^i Ring ) ) |
\
 Lemma 1 for ~ srhmsubcOLD .  (Contributed by AV, 19-Feb-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.)
